msg: Close, but not close enough to win any awards.
I see telepathy isn't your strong suit.
You two might need to work on that mind-meld.
Guessing isn't as easy as it looks, huh?
Well, that was...something.
Just a few thousand more tries and you might get it.
Looks like you two need a few more practice rounds.
Not quite the dynamic duo today, are we?
You were so close! (Just kidding, not really.)
Maybe try guessing with your eyes closed next time.
Don't worry, guessing isn't for everyone.
That was... an interesting choice.
Better luck next time. Or maybe the time after that.
I'm sure you’ll guess it... eventually.
You’re not psychic, are you?
Keep trying! Who knows, miracles happen.
Well, at least you’re consistent.
Rome wasn't built in a day, and neither are good guesses.
Close enough... if 'close' meant 'not at all.'
You must be saving all your good guesses for later, right?
